name: Honor Magic8 RSR Porsche Design
highlights:
Exp. release 2026, January 23
239g, 8.5mm thickness
Android 16, MagicOS 10
512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.SIM:
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time) - INT
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM - CN
BODY: IP68/IP69K dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO OLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, 4320Hz PWM, Dolby Vision, HDR Vivid, 1800 nits (HBM), 6000 nits (peak)

PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.6, 23mm (wide), 1/1.3", 1.2µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS
200 MP, f/2.6, 85mm (periscope telephoto), 1/1.4", 0.56µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS, 3.7x optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.0, 12mm, 122˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.88", 0.61µm, dual pixel PDAF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama

COMMS.Bluetooth: 6.0, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, LHDC 5.0
COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS, BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L1+L5)

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), Face ID, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
FEATURES: Emergency SOS via satellite (messages only) - China only

BATTERY.Charging:
120W wired, 100W PPS, 40W UFCS
80W wireless
Reverse wireless
5W reverse wired
